name: samepage.in
overview:
what is “samepage”? Itâ€™s a simple “do things together” platform Itâ€™s an activity bridge for collaborative groups

What is the samepage application suite? Today the Samepage platform offers same time usage of the following applications 1) Task Manager 2) Note Taker

Invite team members to a session to discuss & assign tasks. Minute Conversationsâ€™ & take Notes Manage Personal & Group tasks. Receive Notifications, Alerts & Updates on Tasks. Manage your Task list and Work schedules collaboratively. Export Sessions & Email

Why Samepage? If you wish minute a meeting with your team working remotely or want to collaborate and schedule tasks and time lines with your client and achieve the same result you would have, had you guys met in some conference room, then this may be for you. Think about a product that allows groups to chat and use stand alone applications together and at the same time! Thatâ€™s the proposition unveiled by Azri Technologies, a web services start up . Available at www.samepage.in , the service aims to be an online platform that will allow distributed people to perform activities together. The web service allows users to have an online chat and use a task manager or note taker application at the same time.

User Story: Situation (This happened really) A biking group (motorcyclists) were planning a road trip across 4000 miles to the Himalayas. Trips such as these require intense planning before the day of departure. There were more than 25 members in the group. They had a 2 month pre -departure plan to be executed that included preparing a requirement list , setting tasks & deadlines, delegating responsibility , follow-up and review of progress ,revising deadlines & tasks on a daily basis for a period of 2 months.

Problem Statement All the members were employed in different companies. It was difficult for the group to meet on a daily basis and review progress. They needed a platform that will allow them communicate as a group and do these things together. A platform that will allow them to jointly prepare requirement sheets, task lists, delegate responsibility and deadlines and review progress.

The samepage solution The same page platform was used extensively by the group for this purpose. The group chat along with the Note-taker and the Task manager application ensured that every single member of the group were in the same page literally. Nothing was missed. In fact productivity improved.

The Same Page Mandate: The focus of samepage is create an exciting collaborative platform that will enable conversations and activities become productive for disparate groups.
